titles.title: America's National World War II Museum Act of 2003
To authorize reference to the National D-Day Museum in New Orleans, Louisiana, as "America's National World War II Museum".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: 5/14/2003--Introduced. America's National World War II Museum Act of 2003 - Authorizes the National D-Day Museum in New Orleans, Louisiana (which is managed by the National D-Day Museum Foundation, Inc.) to be referred to as America's National World War II Museum.
